alert.note: Alert for Gwinnett (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 05 at 4:29PM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Sweetwater Creek near Lilburn affecting Gwinnett County. Pew Creek near Lawrenceville affecting Gwinnett County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Pew Creek near Lawrenceville. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11 feet, Minor flooding of the natural flood plain begins. The parking lot of the Saratoga Swim and Tennis Club downstream from the river gauge begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 PM EDT Tuesday the stage was 11.2 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 11 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
